name: miniBoilerplate
body:
# Description

**Looking to create a new jQuery plugin in CoffeeScript using Test-driven development? If so, miniBoilerplate is your solution.**

_As an example, the boilerplate has been used to create every [minijs.com](http://minijs.com/) plugins._

# Test-driven development

With the boilerplate, it's easy to go for Test-driven development while creating your plugin with [Jasmine](http://pivotal.github.com/jasmine/).

To be able to run the test suite, you'll need to install the Jasmine ruby gem. If you have [bundler](http://gembundler.com/) installed just follow these instructions:

```
cd path/to/plugin/directory
bundle install
rake jasmine
open http://localhost:8888/
```

***

[Guard](https://github.com/netzpirat/guard-jasmine) automatically tests your Jasmine specs when files are modified which will significantly increase your productivity. To do so you'll need to install [phantomjs](http://phantomjs.org/) and follow these instructions.

```
cd path/to/plugin/directory
guard
```

# Contributing

Please, feel free to contribute to this project on [Github](https://github.com/miniJs/miniBoilerplate).
